relation.text: written to my dear & respected friends . I am as equally persuaded of the constancy of their regard & good wishes towards me as I am certain of the constancy of my attachment towards them -- I am now
bleſsed be God they are not only now
s Sincere & Affe . friend Mary Dickenson Taxal 7 March 1789
spent a very agreeable day at Sandleford in the autumn
